entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Nelson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nelson 03:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow mixed with freezing rain this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
